articles.title: Campus Safety Update
articles.content: New security measures have been implemented across campus to ensure student safety. Please review the updated safety protocols.
articles.summary: New security measures have been implemented across campus to ensure student safety.

articles.title: New Research Opportunities Available
articles.content: Faculty are offering new research opportunities for undergraduate students. Apply now for hands-on experience in your field of study.
articles.summary: Faculty are offering new research opportunities for undergraduate students.

articles.title: Library Hours Extended
articles.content: The library will now be open until 10 PM on weekdays to accommodate student study needs during exam periods.
articles.summary: The library will now be open until 10 PM on weekdays to accommodate student study needs.

articles.title: Welcome to the New Academic Year!
articles.content: We are excited to welcome all students, faculty, and staff to the new academic year. This year brings exciting new opportunities and challenges.
articles.summary: We are excited to welcome all students, faculty, and staff to the new academic year.

articles.title: Student Tech Fair - January 25th
articles.content: Join us for the annual Student Tech Fair on January 25th in the main auditorium. Students will showcase their innovative projects and compete for prizes.
articles.summary: Join us for the annual Student Tech Fair on January 25th in the main auditorium.

articles.title: New Course Registration Open
articles.content: Course registration for the upcoming semester is now open. Please check your student portal for available courses and registration deadlines.
articles.summary: Course registration for the upcoming semester is now open.
